FlowDefinition.description: When Sales Rep with Profiles "Hosp SMB Sales" and "Hosp SMB Sales with Hosted" creates a lead with the lead source "Phone Inquiry" then the lead should automatically be assigned to the Campaign "2021_MarketingInboundCalls_Campaign_Hospitality". Last Modification done for - EBA_SF-2466
FlowDefinition.masterLabel: Automate campaign assignment when Lead Source is 'Phone Inquiry' is created or updated
